title: The Tech Weekender: Top news from the world of technology this week - Moneycontrol
content: The Tech Weekender: Top news from the world of technology this week  Moneycontrol
description: More Chinese apps get banned. We tell you all that you need to know about satellite broadband, take the Alienware M15 Ryzen Edition R5 and Vivo Ti for a spin, give you the deets on Samsung's Galaxy S22 pricing and a friendly list of the best smartphones you can buy under Rs 30,000
